1.content:
Study Information and Statement of Informed Consent

Thank you for your interest in participating in our study on decision making. Please take your time to read this text carefully. By checking the box at the bottom of this page and proceeding further, you indicate that you have read the information below and that you consent to participate in the study.


1. Aim of the study

In this study, we want to investigate how people make decisions between different options after learning about these options by inspecting samples of information.


2. Procedure and content of the study

You will make choices between stimuli. You will first practice a few warm up trials. You will then have 6 blocks with 45 choice trials each. You can take brief breaks between blocks if you need.


3. Are there any risks involved?

There are no risks involved in participation.


4. What will happen to the information and data collected?

This study is a joint research project of the University of Balearic Islands, University of Zurich, and Max Planck Institute (MPI) for Human Development (carlos.rey@uib.es). The data collected will be used for research purposes only.

5. Participation is voluntary

Participation in this study is voluntary. You may withdraw from the study at any time without giving any reason and without any negative consequences. If you withdraw from the study before completing it, you will not receive the compensation or bonus payment.


6. Data

This experiment is a research project. Collected data will be analyzed for research purposes only. Experiment data may be shared for collaborative analysis. In addition, they can be public accessible if article is published in a scientific journal. This allows the results to be reproduced by other researchers and promotes the quality of scientific practice. The data can also be used for new research questions that go beyond the goals of today's study. In any case, the experiment data is only transferred or published without personal contact data.


7. Consent

This document has informed you about participation in the study on decision making. The study involves an experiment of approximately 20-25 minutes. If you complete the study, you will receive a baseline compensation of 2.50 GBP (ca. 3 USD) plus a performance-contingent bonus ranging from 0 to 2.5 GBP, meaning that your final compensation could range from 2.5 to 5 GBP. The bonus amount is dependent on your decisions in the study. If you do not consent by clicking the box below, you will not be able to participate in the study and you will not receive compensation. In this case, please return your submission by closing experiment tab.

Press continue to continue with the third block.

content.text:
Remember:
${ state.gain_color } represents gains
${ state.loss_color } represents losses

28.content:
Your task

In the following experiment, you will see boxes composed of ${ state.loss_color } pixels and ${ state.gain_color } pixels, where ${ state.gain_color } represents gains and ${ state.loss_color } represents losses:

${ state.loss_color } pixels represent losses.
${ state.gain_color } pixels represent gains.

Thus, when a box is composed of 54.5% gains and 45.5% losses (like the box above), it has a net value of 9 points (54.5% gains - 45.5% losses).

You will be presented with two boxes. Your task is to choose one of the two boxes. In practice block, after each choice you will get feedback about the net value of your chosen box. In main blocks, you will not get feedback about the net value of your chosen box.

You will start with an endowment of ${ state.totalPoints } points.

Important: The net value of a box can be positive (you gain points) or negative (you lose points).

The net value of your chosen box will then be added to or subtracted from these ${ state.totalPoints } points. At the end of each block you will see how many points you have available in total.

The points at the end of the study will influence your final payment! Based on your choices, it is possible to earn additional money!

When you see two boxes, you should press the F-key to choose the left box and press the J-key to choose the right box.

Please respond as quickly as possible.

messageHandlers.title: Uppercase first letter and example
